name: UgLee Games Classics - Nanobot - 2011
description:
This is a game I made in 24 hours for a competition at a game expo (Oct 2011).

You control the world's most sophisticated microscopic robot, The Nanobot. The "Festering Disease" has risen, and The Nanobot is the only hope to rid the deadly pandemic. This game sports the style of 8-Bit is more than the graphics. The controls are simple and the difficulty is assured to those who have never played “Nanobot vs. The Festering Disease”. Controls: Arrow Keys Left and Right – Move the Nanobot Arrow Keys Up and Down – Aim the Bubble Cannon Z Key – Jet propulsion ; Hold down for continuous propulsion X Key – Fires the Bubble Cannon Press ESC at any time to exit the game.

This is the second game in the UgLee Games Classic series. UgLee Games Classic games are designed to help me improve and experiment in programming and design. All games in the UgLee Games Classic series are free to play.
